identification.description: Defines a scheme for expressing the level of reporting for regulatory            reporting

codes.description: Code indicates that this is reported at the Position level. Position                    level means a collection (or portfolio) of trades all of which are on the                    identical security, which have been aggregated into a net position in that                    security, and this is represented by a single FpML trade conveying the aggregate                    exposure. This is equivalent to the SFTR “Position” (PSTN) value. It is not to                    be used for OTC derivative transaction.

Code indicates that this is reported on a trade by trade basis. SFTR                    synonym: Transaction. Value matches CPMI-IOSCO CDE, CFTC Part 45 (2019), EMIR,                    and MIFID ‘Trade' value and to SFTR 'Single Transaction' value.
